typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ITEM_NBR as string,
		GTIN as string,
		DEPT_NBR as string,
		SUBCLASS_NBR as string,
		VENDOR_NBR as string,
		VENDOR_DEPT_NBR as string,
		VENDOR_SEQ_NBR as string,
		Supplier_Name as string,
		ITEM_STATUS_CODE as string,
		Is_GDSN as string,
		ITEM1_DESC as string,
		ITEM2_DESC as string,
		SIGNING_DESC as string,
		SIGNING1_DESC as string,
		SIGNING2_DESC as string,
		DC_Count as integer,
		Club_Count as integer,
		TOTAL_SALE_QTY as string,
		TOTAL_SALES_AMT as integer,
		{Comments for not to migrate} as string,
		Merchant as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	skipLines: 1) ~> source1
